markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Item 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Blessed Tattoo](/Equipment.aspx?ID=498)
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Abjuration" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=2" />
<trait label="Invested" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=98" />
<trait label="Magical" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=103" />
<trait label="Tattoo" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=262" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 92 <sup>2.0</sup>

_[**PFS Note**](/pathfinder-society) Orcs and half-orcs from the Mwangi Expanse have access to blessed tattoos_

**Price** 90 gp

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** tattoo

</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

You can activate the tattoo as a reaction instead of a two-action activity, triggered when a demon attacks you or you attempt a saving throw against a demon’s ability. 

**Activate** <actions string="Two Actions" /> envision, Interact;  **Frequency** once per day;   **Effect** You gain the effect of [_protection against evil_](/Spells.aspx?ID=238).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
name: Blessed Tattoo
